title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes neither of these criteria.

  • One real zero

  • Supporting work includes identification of a correct method for finding the real zeros, but neither of the real zeros is included

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • One real zero

  • Supporting work includes identification of a correct method for finding the real zeros, but neither of the real zeros is included

The student response includes both of these criteria.

  • Both real zeros

  • No other zeros
